title: Youth protest against Kamal Nath’s comment on UP, Bihar workers taking up jobs in MP
title_page: Youth protest against Kamal Nath’s comment on UP, Bihar workers taking up jobs in MPBiharprabha News | Biharprabha News
text:
Patna (Bihar), Dec 18 (ANI): Agitated youth in Patna protested against Madhya Pradesh’s newly sworn-in Chief Minister Kamal Nath on Tuesday. They protested against MP CM by rubbing black ink on Kamal Nath’s posters and shouted slogans against him. One of the protestors said, “The youth are in anger and agitated because of what Kamal Nath has said about not giving employment to youth from UP and Bihar in MP. I demand from Rahul Gandhi that Kamal Nath should be asked to resign.” On December 17, after taking oath as Chief Minister, Kamal Nath waived off farmers’ loan. During the press conference he said that people from Uttar Pradesh and Bihar gets jobs here but locals do not.
